summary: Test module that validates the CogView3+ text‑to‑image generation pipeline. It defines lightweight unit tests using mock components to check core features such as attention slicing, callback execution, and single versus batched inference, and also provides integration tests that run the full pipeline on GPU to confirm end‑to‑end functionality.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the CogView3+ generation pipeline before release, enabling developers to detect regressions and ensure reliable performance in production environments.
